title: News24.com | Coronanvirus: Companies making PPEs should be among first to open as lockdown eases - govt plan
description: The Department of Social Development wants companies that manufacture personal protective equipment (PPE) to be among the first to return to work once the Covid-19 lockdown comes is eased.
content:
The Department of Social Development wants companies that manufacture personal protective equipment (PPE) to be among the first to return to work once the Covid-19 lockdown comes to an end. 
This is contained in a 37-page Powerpoint presentation of the gover… [+2581 chars]
